component.name: Lychee Slicer
component.summary: A powerful and versatile Slicer for Resin and Filament 3D Printers

description.p: With Lychee Slicer, you get the best companion to prepare 3D models for your Resin and Filament 3D Printers. Get access to many features to create a tailored and smooth workflow that fits your needs! Lychee Slicer is easy to use and provides powerful tools in an elegant and intuitive interface. Always be at the edge of 3D Printing with Lychee Slicer!
NOTE: This wrapper is not verified by, affiliated with, or supported by Mango3D

ul.li: Mac OS Sonoma compatibility, including the fix of the suction cup detector and island detection features.
The Island Detector not showing islands on objects has been fixed.
Supports created through the Magic tool no longer go through the model raft.
Advertising issues that reload while using Wifi export has been fixed.
Support painting first support was using the expected preset, but not following supports. It has been fixed.
Better detection of mouse/cursor position when click and dragging supports.
Wi-Fi support for 3D Printers equipped with Chitubox mainboard (ApexMaker x1, Elegoo Saturn 3 Ultra, Elegoo Mars 4 Ultra)
Optional and skippable ads when Slicing for Pro users (related to 3D Printing)
Fix start gcode of Sovol SV07 and SV07 Plus
